original: Åkerskog, Simon Vilhelm, fil. mag., Göteborg, f. 26/5/08- i Vartofta-Åsaka, Skarab. 1. G. m. Carrie Ramfelt. Barn: Bengt f. 36, Gunnar 40, Christer 43. — Stud :ex. i Jönköp. 27, fil. kand. i Upps. 31, fil. mag. 33’, provår v. Gbgs h. real 38-39. Timlär. i Vetlanda 34, e. o. lär. i Sunne 34-36, e. o. lär. o. vik. v. Gbgs h. folksk. (prakt, mellansk.) 36-36, ^e. o. 36-38 o. 39-40, ord. ämnesiär. där sed. 41, timlär. v. Gbgs östra real 39, assist, i fysik v. CTH 39 o. 41 o. sed. 46. Löjtn. i Int:-kår. res. 43.
translated: Åkerskog, Simon Vilhelm, MA, Gothenburg, b. 26/5/08 in Vartofta-Åsaka, Skaraborg. 1. M. Carrie Ramfelt. Children: Bengt b. 1936, Gunnar 1940, Christer 1943. — Completed studies: bachelor's exam in Jönköping 1927, bachelor's degree in Uppsala 1931, master's degree 1933, probationary period at Gothenburg upper secondary school 1938-1939. Hourly teacher in Vetlanda 1934, temporary teacher in Sunne 1934-1936, temporary teacher and substitute teacher at Gothenburg public primary school (practical, intermediate level) 1936-1938 and 1939-1940, regular subject teacher there since 1941, hourly teacher at Gothenburg East upper secondary school 1939, assistant in physics at the Chalmers University of Technology 1939 and 1941, and since 1946. Lieutenant in the Intelligence Corps, reserve 1943.
